Questions.Question: You're eating a banana. Yum! What do you do with the peel?
Answers: Lick it and Throw it in front of a car

Questions.Question: You see some plastic on the ground. What do you do?
Answers: I pick it up and throw it out
I am on un an undercover mission. I have no time to pick things up
